trans-unit.source: FDC Setup Page

seg-source.mrk: FDC Setup Page

trans-unit.source: The setup of cc|factory data capture takes place in the navigation pane by clicking Departments > COSMO CONSULT > cc|bde (FDC) > Setup > FDC Setup.

seg-source.mrk: The setup of cc|factory data capture takes place in the navigation pane by clicking Departments > COSMO CONSULT > cc|bde (FDC) > Setup > FDC Setup.

trans-unit.source: The FDC Setup page contains all the necessary configurations for cc|factory data capture. Some of the settings are the default, e.g. settings are copied on creating work orders and can then be adjusted later as needed.

seg-source.mrk: The FDC Setup page contains all the necessary configurations for cc|factory data capture.
Some of the settings are the default, e.g. settings are copied on creating work orders and can then be adjusted later as needed.

trans-unit.source: On opening the FDC Setup page, several settings are checked and initialized, if nonexistent. The journal templates for invoicing, allocation and processing are created automatically and can be shown or hidden via the FDC Setup. Additionally, the number series are generated.

seg-source.mrk: On opening the FDC Setup page, several settings are checked and initialized, if nonexistent.
The journal templates for invoicing, allocation and processing are created automatically and can be shown or hidden via the FDC Setup.
Additionally, the number series are generated.

trans-unit.source: : FDC Setup

seg-source.mrk: : FDC Setup

trans-unit.source: The fields in the FDC Setup page are described in the following sections.

seg-source.mrk: The fields in the FDC Setup page are described in the following sections.

trans-unit.source: General FastTab

seg-source.mrk: General FastTab

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Order Bundle Time Distribution

seg-source.mrk: Order Bundle Time Distribution

trans-unit.source: Distribution of time for new FDC work orders (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Distribution.htm#_Ref428426432" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Distribution" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Distribution of time for new FDC work orders (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Distribution.htm#_Ref428426432" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Distribution" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: OB Qty. Distribution Default

seg-source.mrk: OB Qty.
Distribution Default

trans-unit.source: Distribution of quantity for new FDC work orders (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Distribution.htm#_Ref428426435" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Distribution" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Distribution of quantity for new FDC work orders (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Distribution.htm#_Ref428426435" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Distribution" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Recording Time Assignment Lapse (h)

seg-source.mrk: Recording Time Assignment Lapse (h)

trans-unit.source: Summarizes different FDC postings in the same FDC entry. Therefore, FDC postings with subtype Recording will have begin time and end time that look for other FDC detailed entries in the same range of time. For example, a value of 1 (hour): a posting of 12:30 to 15:00 would be appended to an existing FDC detailed entry from 09:00 to 12:00.

seg-source.mrk: Summarizes different FDC postings in the same FDC entry.
Therefore, FDC postings with subtype Recording will have begin time and end time that look for other FDC detailed entries in the same range of time.
For example, a value of 1 (hour): a posting of 12:30 to 15:00 would be appended to an existing FDC detailed entry from 09:00 to 12:00.

trans-unit.source: Interrupt Time Assignment Lapse (h)

seg-source.mrk: Interrupt Time Assignment Lapse (h)

trans-unit.source: Summarizes different FDC postings in the same FDC entry. Therefore, FDC postings with subtype Break will have begin time and end time that look for other FDC detailed entries in the same range of time. So breaks can be posted to existing FDC entries with subtype Recording automatically.

seg-source.mrk: Summarizes different FDC postings in the same FDC entry.
Therefore, FDC postings with subtype Break will have begin time and end time that look for other FDC detailed entries in the same range of time.
So breaks can be posted to existing FDC entries with subtype Recording automatically.

trans-unit.source: Create Missing FDC Resources

seg-source.mrk: Create Missing FDC Resources

trans-unit.source: When activated, creates a new FDC resource when an FDC resource cannot be associated with a source on creating FDC work orders.

seg-source.mrk: When activated, creates a new FDC resource when an FDC resource cannot be associated with a source on creating FDC work orders.

trans-unit.source: If not activated, no resource is set if no existing resource is found.

seg-source.mrk: If not activated, no resource is set if no existing resource is found.

trans-unit.source: Posting Permission Init Type

seg-source.mrk: Posting Permission Init Type

trans-unit.source: Specifies the posting permissions on creating an FDC work order line. When set to None, no posting permissions are deposited.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the posting permissions on creating an FDC work order line.
When set to None, no posting permissions are deposited.

trans-unit.source: Order Stock Type

seg-source.mrk: Order Stock Type

trans-unit.source: Used for initialization on creating an FDC resource.

seg-source.mrk: Used for initialization on creating an FDC resource.

trans-unit.source: Concurrent Beginnings

seg-source.mrk: Concurrent Beginnings

trans-unit.source: Specifies the initial concurrent beginning on creating an FDC resource (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Concurrent Beginning.htm#_Ref427921320" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Concurrent Beginning" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the initial concurrent beginning on creating an FDC resource (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Concurrent Beginning.htm#_Ref427921320" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Concurrent Beginning" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: FDC Work Area Assignment Lapse (h)

seg-source.mrk: FDC Work Area Assignment Lapse (h)

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of hours an FDC resource was assigned to the last FDC work area without changing the work area (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="FDC Work Areas.htm" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"FDC Work Areas" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the number of hours an FDC resource was assigned to the last FDC work area without changing the work area (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="FDC Work Areas.htm" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"FDC Work Areas" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Create FDC WO Automatically

seg-source.mrk: Create FDC WO Automatically

trans-unit.source: Creates FDC work orders automatically for source documents.

seg-source.mrk: Creates FDC work orders automatically for source documents.

trans-unit.source: Allow Changes on FDC WO Src.

seg-source.mrk: Allow Changes on FDC WO Src.

trans-unit.source: Locks/unlocks changes in source documents when transferred to FDC work orders, unless posted entries exist for the FDC Work Order.

seg-source.mrk: Locks/unlocks changes in source documents when transferred to FDC work orders, unless posted entries exist for the FDC Work Order.

trans-unit.source: Allow Posting for changed FDC Work Order Sources

seg-source.mrk: Allow Posting for changed FDC Work Order Sources

trans-unit.source: Locks/unlocks changes in source documents, even if posted entries exist for the FDC Work Order.

seg-source.mrk: Locks/unlocks changes in source documents, even if posted entries exist for the FDC Work Order.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: Not all changes are transferred from the source to the FDC Work Order automatically.

seg-source.mrk: Not all changes are transferred from the source to the FDC Work Order automatically.

trans-unit.source: Source Doc. Key as Description

seg-source.mrk: Source Doc.
Key as Description

trans-unit.source: When activated, the source document key is transferred to the FDC work order line as the description.

seg-source.mrk: When activated, the source document key is transferred to the FDC work order line as the description.

trans-unit.source: Barcode Nos.

seg-source.mrk: Barcode Nos.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number series that is used for barcodes in FDC work order lines. Empty lines get assigned barcodes automatically on release of an FDC work order.

trans-unit.source: STDC Time Rounding Precision

seg-source.mrk: STDC Time Rounding Precision

trans-unit.source: Rounds the times of STDC postings to the specified rounding precision.

seg-source.mrk: Rounds the times of STDC postings to the specified rounding precision.

trans-unit.source: Break Invoicing Type

seg-source.mrk: Break Invoicing Type

trans-unit.source: Determines if the breaks to be invoiced (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref427921367" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Invoicing" on page 1</MadCap:xref>) can be either fully deducted, or only the intersection of the break with the break deducted.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if the breaks to be invoiced (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref427921367" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Invoicing" on page 1</MadCap:xref>) can be either fully deducted, or only the intersection of the break with the break deducted.

seg-source.mrk: Invoicing FDC Journal Template Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the FDC journal template name for automatic invoicing of FDC.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the FDC journal template name for automatic invoicing of FDC.

seg-source.mrk: Invoicing FDC Journal Batch Name

seg-source.mrk: Invoicing STDC Journal Template Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the STDC journal template name for automatic invoicing of FDC.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the STDC journal template name for automatic invoicing of FDC.

trans-unit.source: Invoicing STDC Journal Batch Name

seg-source.mrk: Invoicing STDC Journal Batch Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the STDC journal batch name for automatic invoicing of FDC.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the STDC journal batch name for automatic invoicing of FDC.

trans-unit.source: Automatic Invoice Break When Posting

seg-source.mrk: Automatic Invoice Break When Posting

trans-unit.source: When active, breaks are invoiced using the Break Time Patterns (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref427921375" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Invoicing" on page 1</MadCap:xref>). Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

seg-source.mrk: When active, breaks are invoiced using the Break Time Patterns (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref427921375" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Invoicing" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).
Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

trans-unit.source: Autom. Posting When Invoicing Break Entry

seg-source.mrk: Autom.
Posting When Invoicing Break Entry

trans-unit.source: Specifies if invoiced breaks should be posted instantly in FDC and STDC journal templates (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref427921380" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Invoicing" on page 1</MadCap:xref>). Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies if invoiced breaks should be posted instantly in FDC and STDC journal templates (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref427921380" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Invoicing" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).
Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

trans-unit.source: Automatic Processing Input Journal When Posting

seg-source.mrk: Automatic Processing Input Journal When Posting

trans-unit.source: When active, input entries are processed automatically after posting (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Processing.htm#_Ref427921391" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Processing" on page 1</MadCap:xref>). Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

seg-source.mrk: When active, input entries are processed automatically after posting (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Processing.htm#_Ref427921391" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Processing" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).
Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

trans-unit.source: Autom. Posting When Processing Input Journal

seg-source.mrk: Autom.
Posting When Processing Input Journal

trans-unit.source: Specifies if processed input entries in FDC and STDC journal templates should be posted instantly (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Processing.htm#_Ref427921397" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Processing" on page 1</MadCap:xref>). Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies if processed input entries in FDC and STDC journal templates should be posted instantly (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Processing.htm#_Ref427921397" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Processing" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).
Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

trans-unit.source: Dim. Values Mandatory on End

seg-source.mrk: Dim.
Values Mandatory on End

trans-unit.source: FDC Dimensions with “Code Mandatory” have to be specified only at “End” (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Input Entries.htm#_Ref427921406" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Input Entries" on page 1</MadCap:xref>). In the FDC terminal, the corresponding dialogues are shown for capture.

seg-source.mrk: FDC Dimensions with “Code Mandatory” have to be specified only at “End” (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Input Entries.htm#_Ref427921406" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Input Entries" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).
In the FDC terminal, the corresponding dialogues are shown for capture.

trans-unit.source: Link Input Entries While Posting

seg-source.mrk: Link Input Entries While Posting

trans-unit.source: Specifies if automatically linked input entries should be found and connected during posting. Activation is recommended for an automated run of FDC.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies if automatically linked input entries should be found and connected during posting.
Activation is recommended for an automated run of FDC.

trans-unit.source: Run as Limited User

seg-source.mrk: Run as Limited User

trans-unit.source: When cc|fdc is run as Limited User, FDC Input Entries will not be processed automatically – this should be done by a job routine or a manual processing.

seg-source.mrk: When cc|fdc is run as Limited User, FDC Input Entries will not be processed automatically – this should be done by a job routine or a manual processing.

trans-unit.source: This option must be active when, e.g., the FDC Terminal is used by Limited Users.

seg-source.mrk: This option must be active when, e.g., the FDC Terminal is used by Limited Users.

trans-unit.source: Automatic Order Bundle Distribution When Posting

trans-unit.source: When activated, order bundles of FDC work orders are distributed automatically during posting (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Distribution.htm#_Ref428426445" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Distribution" on page 1</MadCap:xref>). Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

trans-unit.source: Autom. Posting When Order Bundle Distribution

seg-source.mrk: Autom.
Posting When Order Bundle Distribution

trans-unit.source: Specifies if distributed order bundles should be posted instantly in FDC journal batch. Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies if distributed order bundles should be posted instantly in FDC journal batch.
Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

trans-unit.source: Accumulated Export

seg-source.mrk: Accumulated Export

trans-unit.source: Combines multiple FDC detailed entries of the same subtype into one export (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Export.htm#_Ref427921431" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Export" on page 1</MadCap:xref>) to reduce the amount of postings in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: Combines multiple FDC detailed entries of the same subtype into one export (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Export.htm#_Ref427921431" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Export" on page 1</MadCap:xref>) to reduce the amount of postings in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

trans-unit.source: Combined Time Qty. Export

seg-source.mrk: Combined Time Qty.
Export

trans-unit.source: Combines multiple FDC detailed entries of the same source (respectively the same export target). This way outputs, consumptions and recordings are merged, if possible to reduce the amount of postings in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: Combines multiple FDC detailed entries of the same source (respectively the same export target).
This way outputs, consumptions and recordings are merged, if possible to reduce the amount of postings in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

trans-unit.source: Automatic Posting When Export

seg-source.mrk: Automatic Posting When Export

trans-unit.source: When activated, FDC entries are exported to standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV journals after posting (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Export.htm#_Ref427921609" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Export" on page 1</MadCap:xref>). Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

seg-source.mrk: When activated, FDC entries are exported to standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV journals after posting (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Export.htm#_Ref427921609" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Export" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).
Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

trans-unit.source: Automatic Export When Posting

seg-source.mrk: Automatic Export When Posting

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the journal batches of exported FDC entries should be posted instantly (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Export.htm#_Ref427921616" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Export" on page 1</MadCap:xref>). Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies if the journal batches of exported FDC entries should be posted instantly (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Export.htm#_Ref427921616" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Export" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).
Activating this field is recommended for an automated run of FDC and STDC.

trans-unit.source: Allow Terminal FDC Res. Lookup

seg-source.mrk: Allow Terminal FDC Res.
Lookup

trans-unit.source: Enables/disables the lookup for FDC Resources in the FDC Terminal.

seg-source.mrk: Enables/disables the lookup for FDC Resources in the FDC Terminal.
